name: File Explorer: The Search For Files (tyzor)
name_original: File Explorer: The Search For Files (tyzor)
description:
Dig deep into a manic user's file system as you control the CPU. Race to complete tasks requested by the user by digging through folders and files to find, move or delete!

Watch out for bugs and virus as they will be fighting to obtain your RAM. Run out available RAM and its that's a System Crash!

Enter the fungeon!

Controls:

W,A,S,D or ARROW KEYS to move
SPACEBAR for attack (hold for charging an attack but beware! It may cost some RAM!)
